>>An example of a country where the age-structure diagram looks like a pyramid is:<< (x) India () Italy () Germany () Russia () Japan
[explanation] A pyramid age-structure diagram indicates an increasing population. India has an increasing population, while the rest of the countries in the question are either declining in population or are stable. [explanation]
